Surface data.surface_geotiff_COMMENT: raster representing treetops, ground and everything else

Ground data.no_elevation_data_COMMENT: Will ignore elevation_geotiff and will follow surface
Ground data.elevation_geotiff_COMMENT: raster representing just ground and water

Input_files.geotiffs_vertical_datum_is_ASL_COMMENT: the input rasters above are referenced to sea level. (e.g. EGM96) if false assumed reference is ellipsoid

Select ONE Output file option:_RADIO.DJI Mag or Lidar Flight_COMMENT: Normal 3D waypoint DJI drone flight. No camera triggering. (.kmz)
Select ONE Output file option:_RADIO.DJI Ortho Photo Flight_COMMENT: The drone will face the camera down and trigger 1/s. (.kmz)
Select ONE Output file option:_RADIO.Ardupilot 3D Waypoints_COMMENT: Output file will be for Ardupilot type drone (.waypoints)

Settings.simplification_buffer_COMMENT: meters, can decrease separation from objects by this amount
Settings.max_turn_radius_COMMENT: meters, turn radius will be set to this where space allows it. this will cut corners so use with caution
Settings.open_layer_upon_completion_COMMENT: Open layer in QGIS after processing is done
